name: UpdateTrelloBoard
description:
Update details of an existing Trello board.

This tool updates an existing Trello board using its unique ID. It should be called when board details need to be modified.

parameters.name: board_id
parameters.description: The unique identifier for the Trello board to be updated.

parameters.name: new_board_name
parameters.description: The new name for the board. Must be 1 to 16384 characters long.

value_schema.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

parameters.name: board_description
parameters.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long.

value_schema.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long

parameters.name: user_subscribed_to_board
parameters.description: Indicate if the acting user is subscribed to the board. Use 'true' or 'false'.

value_schema.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the board

parameters.name: workspace_id_for_board
parameters.description: The unique ID of the Workspace to which the board should be moved.

value_schema.description: The id of the Workspace the board should be moved to

parameters.name: permission_level
parameters.description: Set the board's permission level: org, private, or public.

value_schema.description: One of: org, private, public

parameters.name: who_can_invite
parameters.description: Specifies who can invite people to the board. Accepts 'admins' or 'members'.

value_schema.description: Who can invite people to this board. One of: admins, members

parameters.name: voting_permissions
parameters.description: Specify who can vote on this board. Options: disabled, members, observers, org, public.

value_schema.description: Who can vote on this board. One of disabled, members, observers, org, public

parameters.name: comment_permission
parameters.description: Specify who can comment on cards. Options: disabled, members, observers, org, public.

value_schema.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: disabled, members, observers, org, public

parameters.name: background_preference
parameters.description: Specify the background for the board. Use a custom background ID or choose from: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey.

value_schema.description: The id of a custom background or one of: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey

parameters.name: card_aging_preference
parameters.description: Set card aging style on the board. Options: pirate, regular.

value_schema.description: One of: pirate, regular

parameters.name: close_board
parameters.description: Sets whether the board should be closed. Use true to close the board and false to keep it open.

value_schema.description: Whether the board is closed

parameters.name: allow_workspace_members_to_join
parameters.description: Allows Workspace members to join the board themselves. True to allow, false to disallow.

value_schema.description: Whether Workspace members can join the board themselves

parameters.name: display_card_covers
parameters.description: Set to true to display card covers on the board, false to hide them.

value_schema.description: Whether card covers should be displayed on this board

parameters.name: hide_voter_identities
parameters.description: If true, the Voting Power-Up hides who voted on cards.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the Voting Power-Up should hide who voted on cards or not.

parameters.name: calendar_feed_enabled
parameters.description: Set to true to enable the calendar feed; false to disable it.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the calendar feed is enabled or not.

metadata.description: Tools that enable LLMs to interact directly with the trello API.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

value_schema.description: The new name for the board. 1 to 16384 characters long.

parameters.name: desc
parameters.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long

value_schema.description: A new description for the board, 0 to 16384 characters long

parameters.name: closed
parameters.description: Whether the board is closed

value_schema.description: Whether the board is closed

parameters.name: subscribed
parameters.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the board

value_schema.description: Whether the acting user is subscribed to the board

parameters.name: idOrganization
parameters.description: The id of the Workspace the board should be moved to

value_schema.description: The id of the Workspace the board should be moved to

parameters.name: prefs/permissionLevel
parameters.description: One of: org, private, public

value_schema.description: One of: org, private, public

parameters.name: prefs/selfJoin
parameters.description: Whether Workspace members can join the board themselves

value_schema.description: Whether Workspace members can join the board themselves

parameters.name: prefs/cardCovers
parameters.description: Whether card covers should be displayed on this board

value_schema.description: Whether card covers should be displayed on this board

parameters.name: prefs/hideVotes
parameters.description: Determines whether the Voting Power-Up should hide who voted on cards or not.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the Voting Power-Up should hide who voted on cards or not.

parameters.name: prefs/invitations
parameters.description: Who can invite people to this board. One of: admins, members

value_schema.description: Who can invite people to this board. One of: admins, members

parameters.description: Who can vote on this board. One of disabled, members, observers, org, public

value_schema.description: Who can vote on this board. One of disabled, members, observers, org, public

parameters.name: prefs/comments
parameters.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: disabled, members, observers, org, public

value_schema.description: Who can comment on cards on this board. One of: disabled, members, observers, org, public

parameters.name: prefs/background
parameters.description: The id of a custom background or one of: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey

value_schema.description: The id of a custom background or one of: blue, orange, green, red, purple, pink, lime, sky, grey

parameters.description: One of: pirate, regular

value_schema.description: One of: pirate, regular

parameters.description: Determines whether the calendar feed is enabled or not.

value_schema.description: Determines whether the calendar feed is enabled or not.
